attributes.action: To legualise  a private diagnoses of children’s mental health .
attributes.additional_details: Make it legal for private diagnoses in children to be regonised
attributes.background: On average it can take between 2-4 years for the nhs to diagnose children on the spectrum . Getting a private diagnoses cuts this time and can children the help they so need in order to give them the future they so deserve

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure who you would like to recognise private mental health diagnoses and what action you would like them to take. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
